timeline.bodyText: Nothing about this PR, but I wonder if another PR is needed to remove these deprecated in master as well. I can run some tests and help with that.
timeline.author: zhongnansu

  */
 
 buildscript {

     ext {
-        // When upgrading to version after 7.3.0, must remove also
-        // project substitution from configurations.all (line 39)

+        es_version = "7.6.1"
